dataColl.sampProc: multi-stage sample: first stage: sampling of municipalities, stratification of number of households in municipalities;: second stage selection of adresses;: third stage determining a cluster of three other addresses near the selected address and out of these three addresses a respondent was selected Number of unit original/losses: nr. of cases: 2016
